extendedInfo.description: GuitarTuna is the easiest, fastest and most accurate free guitar tuner app out there!We noticed most of free tuner apps suck so we made one that doesn't:â¢ Simple and easy to use - no fuss, clean interface'â¢ Now with option to buy different alternative tuning sets (including for example drop d, open, custom tuning, ukulele tuning and others)â¢ Simple and easy to useâ¢ Actually listens - works with the built-in microphone of your Android deviceâ¢ Ridiculously accurate - built with award-winning world class audio signal processingâ¢ Free - no restricted features, none of those spammy adsAnd that's not all, GuitarTuna is packaged with useful features:â¢ Clear visual feedback with signal history - simple and intuitiveâ¢ Auto mode (automatically recognizes which string you play -> lets you tune quickly, hands-free)â¢ Supports left-handed tuning (switch to inverted strings)â¢ Works in noisy conditions (automatic background noise cancellation)â¢ Works with acoustic and electric guitarsâ¢ Currently works for 6-string guitars, for standard tuningWhat the users say:"Super super great tuner by far the best on the whole market thanks for the help and love the individual keys to let u tune each string individual......thanks"Robert Simpson - December 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1"It's easy and makes my guitar sounds better than all the other apps I use . I'm satisfied :)"- linda pel - January 23, 2013 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.1"Love it. Best tunner ever. I have trouble tuning a guitar but this app makes it easy."- Andrew Ditch - March 10, 2013 - Version 1.1"This is the best tuner I've tried, looks good and works well in noisy environments!"- A Google User - November 8, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S3 with version 1.1"This is perfect i untuned my guitar one day tried a diffrent tuner didnt work this did perfect 5 stars"- ezequiel corrales - December 8, 2012 - Version 1.1"This app is just awesome.I tried many other tuner apps but its da best and accurate.good job guys:-)"- Suman Das - January 24, 2013 - Version 1.1-----*** Got Ideas to make GuitarTuna even better?We're serious about improving GuitarTuna - only the best stuff for musicians by musicians:Let us know what you think - send a mail to feedback@ovelin.com and we'll get back to you.-----*** Developed by Ovelin Ltd (www.ovelin.com) ***Developer of the first Online Guitar learning game that works with a real guitar (www.guitarbots.com)Â - Start playing for free: www.guitarbots.com- Check the 1min intro: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ksz7qFK_2rg- Check it out on facebook : www.facebook.com/guitarbotsDeveloper of Award-winning guitar learning game WildChords for iPad (#1 music app in 34 countries):- More details: www.wildchords.com- Check it out on facebook : www.facebook.com/wildchords

reviews.author: jack daniel

reviews.title: The first app I have ever paid for-worth it!
reviews.comment: I have never before bought a paid app but I couldn\'t be happier! I use a lot of open and custom tuning and it works great. I highly recommend! If you just use standard tuning the free version is also awesome. Thanks for making a great product that works as it should and is so easy to use!
reviews.author: Amanda Hoppers

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Simple.  Accurate.  Cool chart recorder format.  Thumbs up!
reviews.author: Nancy Kingcaid

reviews.title: Brilliant luvn it
reviews.comment: So cool to have on fone, useful as, dont stress no more as can tune up where eva. Easy as visuals, great app.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great Tuna! sweet sound and easy to use
reviews.author: Adam Lopez

reviews.title: 5 stars all the way!
reviews.comment: The first,  and I mean first,  guitar tuner for Android that is smooth as glass without a bit of jitter. You could not find an easier to use alternative, IMHO. This is the 5th of such apps that I have installed and the best. Give it a shot.  You\'ve got nothing to lose except your discordant chords!
reviews.author: Steve Sorenson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, add on tuning packages very reasonable for such a useful app. 5 stars isn\'t enough!

reviews.title: Great app and simple to use
reviews.comment: Very handy to have...you n ever know when you\'ll run into an out of tune guitar!!!

reviews.title: Greay app!
reviews.comment: Don\'t let the name fool you, this is quite possibly the best tuning application available.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Quick, simple, easy to use,    I came back from school and found my brother mucked around with my guitar. My tuner was broken. So I got this app. And its better, faster and easy :-)  should definitely get it

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Amazing app for tuning your Guitar very easy and straight forward to tune your Guitar and very quick also..... I really recommend this to all that need a Guitar tuner this will not let you down.

reviews.title: The best ever guitar tuner
reviews.comment: I am very grateful to the developer. It really works. Very accurate, great interface, and it`s a great automation in music field. Simple and easy to use. I am very satisfied with this. I really recommend this to you who likes guitar.
